prompt_base: photorealistic portrait of a small anthropomorphic Shiba Inu dog ninja, realistic brown fur texture, fierce expression, wearing a black ninja outfit, katana on back
feature_prompt: sharp focus on dog jaw and canine facial structure, metallic texture on katana and hilt, woven fabric on ninja outfit
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, human hands, human face, smooth skin, plastic costume, low quality
